content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Plate Production Area
Consists of two furnaces working in parallel:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and copper ore input
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and copper ore input

### Iron Plate Production Area
- Furnace 3 at position(4.0, 4.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Electronic Circuit Production Line
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished circuits to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Pipe network connecting water from pump to boiler (positions: -9.5/23.5, -8.5/23.5, -8.5/22.5, -7.5/22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network (positions: -5.5/24.5, -5.5/25.5, -5.5/26.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electricity distribution network connecting multiple poles across the map

### Science Pack Storage and Research
- Lab facilities with automation and logistic science pack inputs
- Storage chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing science packs
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5) feeding science packs to lab

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Cannot research technologies that are already researched (electronics, automation-2, steel-processing)
- Cannot research technologies without prerequisites (advanced-electronics needs plastics, electric-engine needs lubricant)
- Several invalid technology names used: FluidHandling, EngineUnit, ElectricEngine, ElectricEngineUnit, Engine

### Resource Management Errors
- Attempting to insert coal when inventory is empty - check inventory before attempting insertions

### Production Issues
- Electronic circuit production stalled due to missing copper cable ingredients - ensure steady supply of materials
